description: Coefficients of polynomials related to Chebyshev's quadrature.
references: C. A. Pickover, The Math Book, Sterling, NY, 2009; see p. 184.
H. E. Salzer, Tables for facilitating the use of Chebyshev's quadrature formula, Journal of Mathematics and Physics, 26 (1947), 191-194.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: B. D. McKay, A. Meynert and W. Myrvold, Small Latin Squares, Quasigroups and Loops, J. Combin. Des. 15 (2007), no. 2, 98-119.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Chebyshev Quadrature
Index entries for sequences related to Chebyshev polynomials.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Pab Ter (pabrlos(AT)yahoo.com), May 11 2004
